dmca.title: Individual complains of copied photograph
dmca.body:
Dear Sirs: 

I wish to complain about copyright violation of a photograph stolen from my site. The photo is one that I took of myself, [private], and is posted at JeffLindsay.com. The copyright violation occurs at http://joinatyourownrisk.blogspot.com/2005/10/morman-church-leader-pleads-guilty-in.html, where my photo is placed as if I were the person accused of sexual abuse of children. 

The original photo, which I took in Cambridge, England using a time delay feature on my camera, is posted on my Website at http://www.jefflindsay.com/jeff.html. 

The URL for his photo is 
htt://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/3140/1627/1600/alvin.jpg. 

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web page is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner. 

I can be reached at [private]@jefflindsay.com or [private]. 
Sincerely,  
[private]
[private] 
Appleton, WI 54915
